name: unwounded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having an injury such as a cut or hole in the skin: After the attack there were only twenty unwounded men left in the fort. Those of us who were still unwounded tried to escape to the mountains. Opposite
wounded
More examplesFewer examplesI left a couple of unwounded men to guard the camp.The general sent an unwounded aide to report the outcome of the battle.They rounded up the unwounded soldiers from the enemy army and made them prisoners.
